00021 #ifndef _ParameterFileData_HEADER_
00022 #define _ParameterFileData_HEADER_
00023 
00024 /*! \file ParameterFileData.h This file provides definitions for data in a parameter file.
00025  */
00026 
00027 #include <cstring>
00028 #include <list>
00029 #include <string>
00030 //
00031 
00032 namespace affymetrix_calvin_parameter
00033 {
00034 
00035 /*! The attributes in the ParameterFile element. */
00036 typedef struct _ParameterFileAttributesType
00037 {
00038     std::wstring company; /*! The company name. */
00039     std::wstring userName; /*! The user name. */
00040     std::wstring contentVersion; /*! The content version. */
00041 } ParameterFileAttributesType;
00042 
00043 /*! The attributes in the Implementation element. */
00044 typedef struct _ImplementationAttributesType
00045 {
00046     std::wstring name; /*! The name. */
00047         std::wstring version; /*! The version number. */
00048         std::wstring executableFileName; /*! The exe file name. */
00049         std::wstring description; /*! The description */
00050 } ImplementationAttributesType;
00051 
00052 /*! The attributes in the Parameter element. */
00053 typedef struct _ParameterType
00054 {
00055     std::wstring name; /*! The name. */
00056     std::wstring index; /*! The index. */
00057     std::wstring displayName; /*! The display name. */
00058     std::wstring category; /*! The category. */
00059     std::wstring isEditable; /*! The idEditable flag */
00060     std::wstring type; /*! The type */
00061     std::wstring currentValue; /*! The current value */
00062     std::wstring minValue; /*! The minimum value */
00063     std::wstring maxValue; /*! The maximum value */
00064     std::wstring defaultValue; /*! The default value */
00065     std::wstring precision; /*! The precision for floating point numbers */
00066     std::wstring maxLength; /*! The maximum length of a string value */
00067     std::wstring description; /*! The description */
00068 } ParameterType;
00069 
00070 /*! A list of parameters. */
00071 typedef std::list<ParameterType> ParameterTypeList;
00072 
00073 /*! Provides data storage for ParameterFile files. This version
00074     does not store all of the contents of a parameter file.
00075     Missing items includes the ParameterSet, MetaData and Control
00076     elements.
00077 */
00078 class ParameterFileData
00079 {
00080 public:
00081     /*! Clears the members in the class. */
00082     void Clear();
00083 
00084     /*! Constructor. */
00085     ParameterFileData();
00086 
00087     /*! The parameter file attributes. */
00088     ParameterFileAttributesType &ParameterFileAttributes() { return parameterFileAttributes; }
00089 
00090     /*! The implementation attributes. */
00091     ImplementationAttributesType &ImplementationAttributes() { return implementationAttributes; }
00092 
00093     /*! The list of parameters. */
00094     ParameterTypeList &Parameters() { return parameters; }
00095 
00096 private:
00097     /*! The parameter file attributes. */
00098     ParameterFileAttributesType parameterFileAttributes;
00099 
00100     /*! The implementation attributes. */
00101     ImplementationAttributesType implementationAttributes;
00102 
00103     /*! The list of parameters. */
00104     ParameterTypeList parameters;
00105 };
00106 
00107 }
00108 
00109 #endif // _ParameterFileData_HEADER_
